channel.title: PS3 and Xbox360 online link
channel.description:
Has anyone played online multiplayer with PS3 players and Xbox360. Is there a sort of adapter for this? Can't we all just be friends and not fight over the silly console even though PS3 is proven better? What if I feel like killing some Xbox360 people on Call of Duty? I'm not going to go buy one. I want an adapter. Has anyone heard of this/done this?
EDIT: I know it's unlikely, but NOT impossible.

item.title: PS3 and Xbox360 online link
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

Shadowrun! PC users could play with 360 users.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 and Xbox360 online link
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:16, topic:292017”]I’m just wondering, can PC games using Live play against Xbox360 players?

I think I have read something about this somewhere but I can’t remember.[/quote]

There is one or two games that allow you to do it, but they were failures. There are a few PC games by SOE that are planned for the PS3 too, stuff like The Agency, DC Universe online and Free realms - all planned for PS3 - PC play.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 and Xbox360 online link
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“Full Metalst, post:10, topic:292017”][quote author=the bank link=topic=385848.msg2892883#msg2892883 date=1249009293]
Stick your dick in the ethernet plug.

PS3 has been proven more expensive console-wise, internet-wise, it’s less expensive. They’re two good consoles, who cares which one’s better?

Anyway, I’m not sure what you’re trying to ask… Like do you want to kill Xbox 360 players on a PS3 by connecting an adapter?
[/quote]WHy are you here with your mind less rambling? No one likes u!

It’s Mopar, people like you make me not want to come. Lots of people like me here. Stop flaming people especially me.[/quote]

Then why the Hell are you still here!

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 and Xbox360 online link
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:4, topic:292017”]The infrastructure of both networks are totally different, it would require sony and microsoft to somehow bridge that gap. It wouldn’t be beneficial to either sony or microsoft to do so.

So no its not possible by some “adapter” or anything of the like.[/quote]

Anything is possible.

Read full topic

So, it’s possible… Just not legal.
